Title: Life Serial
Plot: As Buffy tries to 'normalize' her new life as a parent and return to college and attempt numerous jobs, she again comes up against the Troika, a group of would-be sorcerers, who test the Slayer by casting spells on her which make her experience time distortions, magically appearing demons and a strange "Groundhog Day" time loop.
GuestStars: Paul Gutrecht, Noel Guglielmi, Enrique Almeida, Marcia Ann Burrs, Jonathan Goldstein, Winsome Brown, Christopher May, David J. Miller, Andrew Cooper Wasser, Richard Beatty, James C. Leary, Jennifer Shon, Jabari
